mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `member` SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), loginId = #{loginId}, loginPw = #{loginPw}, salt = #{salt}, `name` = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}, authLevel = 2;
mapper.select: SELECT m.*, COUNT(r.id) AS extra__totalWrittenReplies FROM ( SELECT m.*, COUNT(a.id) AS extra__totalWrittenArticles FROM `member` m LEFT JOIN article a ON m.id = a.memberId WHERE m.id = #{id} ) AS m LEFT JOIN reply r ON m.id = r.memberId WHERE m.id = #{id}
